nodes.name: sendValue

argument_types.type_string: literal_string "Address: unable to send value, recipient may have reverted"

arguments.value: Address: unable to send value, recipient may have reverted

type_description.type_string: literal_string "Address: unable to send value, recipient may have reverted"

arguments.text: "Address: unable to send value, recipient may have reverted"

nodes.text: functionsendValue(addresspayablerecipient,uint256amount)internal{require(address(this).balance>=amount,"Address: insufficient balance");(boolsuccess,)=recipient.call{value:amount}("");require(success,"Address: unable to send value, recipient may have reverted");}

argument_types.type_string: literal_string "Address: low-level call with value failed"

arguments.value: Address: low-level call with value failed

type_description.type_string: literal_string "Address: low-level call with value failed"

argument_types.type_string: literal_string "SafeERC20: approve from non-zero to non-zero allowance"

arguments.value: SafeERC20: approve from non-zero to non-zero allowance

type_description.type_string: literal_string "SafeERC20: approve from non-zero to non-zero allowance"

arguments.text: "SafeERC20: approve from non-zero to non-zero allowance"

nodes.name: _callOptionalReturn

argument_types.type_string: literal_string "SafeERC20: ERC20 operation did not succeed"

arguments.value: SafeERC20: ERC20 operation did not succeed

type_description.type_string: literal_string "SafeERC20: ERC20 operation did not succeed"

nodes.text: function_callOptionalReturn(IERC20token,bytesmemorydata)private{bytesmemoryreturndata=address(token).functionCall(data,"SafeERC20: low-level call failed");if(returndata.length>0){require(abi.decode(returndata,(bool)),"SafeERC20: ERC20 operation did not succeed");}}

argument_types.type_string: literal_string "Ownable: caller is not the owner"

arguments.value: Ownable: caller is not the owner

type_description.type_string: literal_string "Ownable: caller is not the owner"

nodes.name: transferOwnership

argument_types.type_string: literal_string "Ownable: new owner is the zero address"

arguments.value: Ownable: new owner is the zero address

type_description.type_string: literal_string "Ownable: new owner is the zero address"

arguments.text: "Ownable: new owner is the zero address"

nodes.text: functiontransferOwnership(addressnewOwner)publicvirtualonlyOwner{require(newOwner!=address(0),"Ownable: new owner is the zero address");_transferOwnership(newOwner);}

nodes.name: pay
nodes.text: functionpay(addresstoken,uint256amount)externalpayablewhenNotPausednonReentrant{require(allowedTokens[token],"Payment token not allowed");paymentId++;_userPaymentIds[msg.sender].push(paymentId);if(token==address(0x0)){require(msg.value>0,"payment should be greater than 0");paymentHistory[paymentId][msg.sender]=PaymentDetail(token,msg.value,block.timestamp);emitPaid(msg.sender,token,msg.value,block.timestamp);}else{require(amount>0,"payment should be greater than 0");IERC20(token).safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount);paymentHistory[paymentId][msg.sender]=PaymentDetail(token,amount,block.timestamp);emitPaid(msg.sender,token,amount,block.timestamp);}}
